SELECT A.*, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM reply WHERE boardid = #{id})replycount FROM (SELECT B.*, (SELECT id FROM board WHERE id < #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)prevbid, (SELECT id FROM board WHERE id > #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1)nextbid FROM (SELECT * FROM board WHERE ${criteria.field} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{criteria.query},'%') ORDER BY regdate DESC)B WHERE B.id = #{id})A
SELECT COUNT(B.ID) COUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE ${field} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') ORDER BY REGDATE DESC)B
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(TITLE, WRITERID, CONTENT) VALUES(#{title}, #{writerId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE BOARD SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE ID = #{id}
